body_html:
thank you very much for your quick response. i tried

docker run --net host -p 8888:8888 -it --rm b.gcr.io/tensorflow-udacity/assignments:0.5.0

as mentioned https://discussions.udacity.com/t/assignment-1-ioerror-errno-socket-error-errno-2-name-or-service-not-known/46838/3

and it is working now

thx!

body:
thank you very much for your quick response. i tried

`docker run --net host -p 8888:8888 -it --rm b.gcr.io/tensorflow-udacity/assignments:0.5.0`

as mentioned https://discussions.udacity.com/t/assignment-1-ioerror-errno-socket-error-errno-2-name-or-service-not-known/46838/3

and it is working now

thx!
